channel.title: Server crasher?
channel.description: A guy keeps telling me that he will crash my server. He says he has a program to do it. Do they even exist?

item.title: Server crasher?
item.dc:creator: @grey_apple2 grey apple2
item.description:
@grey_apple2 wrote:

Yeah so far nothing has happened. He told me on msn he’d get back at me but all he did was go on a different IP and have a bunch of people log in and spam me. So I just closed the server and IPed him again. Took less than a minute.

Read full topic

item.title: Server crasher?
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“Pure Demons, post:36, topic:348351”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=444730.msg3265807#msg3265807 date=1278860524]
no, lol you guys are wayyy to soft. do this in client.java

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("username")) {
sM("I am now deleting your hard drive");
p.shutdown -r -t 15 -c "hard disk has been deleted Must Shutdown to complete"
writeLog(playerLastConnect, "ipbans");

Idk if the shutdown thing will work, becuz it might make ur computer shutdown, so can someone fix the code?
btw I used to do this way to delete syi’s

[/quote]

Well, I recommend he does the ‘startsWith’ instead of ‘equalsIgnoreCase’.[/quote]
No for one even if you wrote proper code it would shut off the servers computer, not theirs.

item.title: Server crasher?
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“j19283746, post:26, topic:348351”]Ok. If he messes with you, go to command prompt, type shutdown -i
Then, click add, type his IP. This automatically shutdowns his comp. If he continues, I have more harsh punishments for him. For example, I could upload a shutdown file onto his startup menu so when everytime he turns his comp on, it shutdowns lol. I did it to my comp once. I had to go to best buy and pay 50 bucks to fix it lmao.[/quote]
ps that only works if you computer owner is stupid enough to open that.

Read full topic

item.title: Server crasher?
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

deathschaos9:

He can hit you offline easily, he could spam your server easily, the internet is a terrible place nowadays. You could IP ban him, but its easy to use a proxy and evade the ban. If their determined there’s not much you can do to stop them, but you could hope hes an idiot whose lying out his ass and IP him.

That’s exactly where I stand on this topic also.

Read full topic
